additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Pizza Base [Australian Flour (Wheat Flour, Thiamine, Folic Acid), Water, Canola Oil, Salt, Sugar, Yeast], Tomato Passata [Tomatoes, Sugar, Salt, Garlic Powder, Oregano], Mozzarella Cheese [Cheese (Pasteurised Milk, Milk Solids, Salt, Acidity Regulator (270), Coagulating Enzyme)], Pepperoni (10%) [Pork (93%), Salt, Skim Milk Powder, Dextrose (Maize), Herb & Spices, Chilli, Mineral Salt (450), Sodium Nitrate (251), Antioxidant (316), Starter Culture, Sodium Nitrite (250)]

additionalProperty.name: Allergen
additionalProperty.value: Contains Gluten, Contains Wheat, Contains Milk

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Whilst every effort has been made, some toppings may require to be rearranged due to handling and shipment of your Pizza.

description: Stone baked pizza base, crushed tomatoes hand topped with stretchy mozzarella cheese with slices of mild pepperoni. Crafting delicious stone baked pizza, hand topped and commited to supporting local growers for you to enjoy with family & friends. Available in freezer aisle.
name: Pepperoni Pizza
